statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name // "default"'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); context_info=''; if [ -n "$remaining" ]; then context_info=$(printf " | Context: %.0f%%" "$remaining"); fi; printf "%s | %s | Style: %s%s" "$model" "$(basename "$dir")" "$style" "$context_info"
